column4: Hello, everybody! just a couple of question for the interested in answering them:
1] my CD drive does not work under Ubuntu 8.10 [at least, not for the playing of music CD's] and I do not have a clue as to how to fix it;

2] I am trying to find a tabbed dual-paned file manager for Gnome, but the only mentions on the Web so far are not even being listed on my system whenever I perform a search for new programs [all sources...]
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
